word: 10-23. Stubbornness Made Saul's Case Hopeless.--It was Saul's stubbornness that made his case hopeless, and yet how many venture to follow his example. The Lord in mercy sends words of reproof to save the erring, but they will not submit to be corrected. They insist that they have done no wrong, and thus resist the Spirit of God (RH May 7, 1895).
